title: GTA Online
headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Double Down on Luxury at The Diamond Casino & Resort
content:
The deck is stacked in your favor at The Diamond Casino & Resort this week.

Claim a free Casino Master Penthouse to take advantage of The Diamondâ€™s amenities, including Double Rewards on Casino Story and Casino Work Missions, plus get double daily Casino Chips.

Anyone with an Arcade (30% off this week) can raid the vault for 2X Rewards in the Diamond Casino Heist Finale while GTA+ Members can get guaranteed Diamonds in the Casino Vault.
